backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a digital product marketplace with blob storage, access control, categories, products, user profiles, purchases, and admin management including auto-initialization for the first authenticated user.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: admin price display/validation, admin price editing UI, and category listing product visibility fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration, detailing the React app structure with authentication, product management, and storefront functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration, and root div for React mounting with title 'Engineer Notes Shop'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for storefront, product detail, admin dashboard, buyer library, category pages, about, and contact, wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-page access denied component displaying shield icon, error message explaining auto-owner assignment, and button to return to storefront.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDiagn: Displays diagnostic information about authentication status, admin privileges, admin system initialization, and product loading states with status badges and refresh functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUploa: Shows contextual alerts and troubleshooting hints for the admin upload feature based on authentication, admin status, and system initialization state with retry buttons.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFil: A file upload button component for PDF files that uses a hidden input with label trigger for mobile compatibility, with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/SafeProduc: Error boundary component that wraps ProductFileUploadButton to catch and display rendering errors with an alert UI instead of crashing.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Responsive header with desktop navigation and mobile sheet menu, conditionally rendering admin button only after admin check completes and user is confirmed admin, plus category dropdown and authentication controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with copyright, developer tools modal trigger, caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking, and build version display with troubleshooting guidance for URL parameter forcing.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper providing consistent page structure with BrandHeader, main content area, and Footer across all routes.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity authentication, displaying different states (logging in, authenticated, unauthenticated) with icons and supporting both default and mobile variants.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with title, author, price, type badge (Book/Notes), and a link to view product details.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name to complete profile setup, with name normalization and form validation.
frontend/src/components/RequestUpdateMod: A multi-tab modal providing developer tools for requesting updates, retrying deployments, and analyzing deployment failures with copy-to-clipboard functionality and report generation.
frontend/src/components/SearchAndFilterB: A search input component with an icon that allows filtering products by title or author.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHero.t: A hero section component displaying a headline, description, and hero image for the engineering knowledge storefront.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing it with Internet Identity and admin token, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation using @dfinity/auth-client.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including admin system initialization, access control checks, user profiles, categories, and product management with mutations and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using a technical grayscale palette, plus utility classes for page layout, typography, and component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static about page displaying Engineer Notes' mission, collection, community, and quality assurance information in a card-based layout with icons.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page for managing products with CRUD operations, file uploads, publishing controls, category management, and store initialization with authentication checks and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/BuyerLibraryPage.tsx: Displays a buyer's purchased products with download functionality, showing empty state if no purchases exist and handling authentication requirements.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryStorefrontPag: Shows products filtered by category with search functionality, includes query diagnostics panel for debugging, and handles profile setup modal for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Static contact page displaying different contact methods (general inquiries, technical support, content suggestions, business inquiries) with email addresses and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product information with purchase functionality, showing product metadata, pricing, and handling purchase flow with navigation to library after success.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Main storefront page with hero section, category browsing grid, product search/filter, and query diagnostics panel for debugging product data.
frontend/src/utils/adminErrors.ts: Utility function that translates backend error messages into user-friendly text, handling authorization, file upload, network, and various admin operation errors.
frontend/src/utils/buildVersion.ts: Manages build version tracking and cache-busting by detecting version mismatches between stored and current versions, triggering a one-time hard reload when needed to prevent stale UI issues.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentCommands.ts: Provides helper functions that return recommended dfx deployment commands for retrying, upgrading, and diagnosing Internet Computer canister deployments.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentFixSuggeste: Analyzes parsed deployment logs and suggests specific fixes with rationale and code snippets based on common error patterns (build, bundle, install failures).
frontend/src/utils/deploymentLogParser.t: Parses deployment output text to identify the failing step (build, bundle, install, or unknown) and extracts relevant error blocks using pattern matching.
frontend/src/utils/formatDeploymentRepor: Formats a structured deployment failure report for developers, combining parsed log data and fix suggestions into a readable text output with sections for failing step, suggested fix, commands, and error details.
Provides a simple utility function to normalize user profile names by trimming whitespace for consistent handling across the application.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, typography, animations, and plugin integrations for the frontend styling.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting an e-commerce platform with known issues around product visibility in category listings, existing features for admin dashboard price management, and pending feature requests to fix backend product queries and publish logic.
